attributes.action: Do something to tackle spiralling population, both in the UK and in the rest of the world.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Spiralling population is by far the biggest problem facing the world today.

Over-population leads to poor quality of life and eventually to conflict and war. (Not to mention total destruction of the environment.)

We need to do something now before it's too late.
